title: Heft Modify Entry Plugin Options Configuration
description: This schema describes the "options" field that can be specified in heft.json when loading "@build-script/heft-modify-entry-plugin".

prefix.title: Prepend string or file to entry file
prefix.description: value starts with "<" will treat as file, find in order: project root, rig profile, rig package root.

suffix.title: Append string or file to entry file
suffix.description: value starts with "<" will treat as file, find in order: project root, rig profile, rig package root.

missing.title: Ignore missing file
missing.description: when true, missing prefix/suffix file will be ignored. (defaults to throw)
